amendatorysection.catchline: Recapture of tax credit; notice of noncompliance; cure period.
amendatorysection.para: The enforcement of section 77-1117 shall be subject to a six-month cure period. No recapture under section 77-1117 shall occur until the qualified community development entity has been given notice of noncompliance and afforded six months from the date of such notice to cure the noncompliance.
